text.0: o thou with stones for arms thy powers crushing the fiends have raised themselves.
text.1: chase thou the foes who compass us.
text.2: thou conquerest thus with might when car meets car and when the prize is staked.
text.3: with fearless heart will i sing praise.
text.4: no one with evil thought assails this pavamanas holy laws.
text.5: crush him who fain would fight with thee.
text.6: for indra to the streams they drive the tawny rapturedropping steed.
